item.title: .NET Dockerhub
item.description: ğŸ“šDockerfile FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 AS build WORKDIR /src COPY ["MyMvcApp.csproj", "./"] RUN dotnet restore "MyMvcApp.csproj" COPY . . WORKDIR "/src/" RUN dotnet build "MyMvcApp.csproj" -c Release -o /app/build FROM build AS publish RUN dotnet publish "MyMvcApp.csproj" -c Release -o /app/publish FROM base AS final WORKDIR /app COPY --from=publish /app/publish . ENTRYPOINT ["dotnet", "MyMvcApp.dll"] âœï¸ Docker é•œåƒ docker build -t mymvcapp:latest . ğŸ“åœ¨ Docker Hub ä¸Šåˆ›å»ºä»“åº“ ç™»å½• Docker Hub (https://hub.docker.com)ã€‚ ç‚¹å‡» “Create Repository”ã€‚ è¾“å…¥ä»“åº“åç§°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ mymvcappï¼Œç„¶åç‚¹å‡» “Create”ã€‚
